graph.original_query: Create a dark-themed, modern multi-page landing website for a Nuclear Fusion Startup using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN (no build tools), with 4 linked pages: index.html (hero with fullscreen background image from picsum.photos (to get 200x300 image use: https://picsum.photos/200/300) or placeholder.com, features, testimonials, CTA, footer with social icons), about.html (mission statement, timeline or values, team cards), products.html (6–8 product/service cards in a grid with title, description, image, price, optional filters), and contact.html (contact form with name/email/message, map placeholder or location card, support links), using consistent dark mode theme, responsive layout, shared header/footer, no lorem ipsum, proper meta tags and titles, and only HTML/CSS/JS. Call CoderAgent atleast 9-10 times for different exhaustive but specific tasks as this is a detailed project. Remember CoderAgent is stateless and can't see other outputs. So you will have to be very specific. Make sure it actually LINKS all the generated file properly in ALL headers.

globals_schema.execution_result_T001: Created a dark-themed, modern hero section for the Nuclear Fusion Startup landing page with Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN, including a fullscreen background image, features section, testimonials, call to action, and footer with social media icons. Also included proper meta tags, title, and links to other pages.
globals_schema.execution_result_T002: Created a dark-themed, modern about.html page for a Nuclear Fusion Startup landing page using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN. Included a mission statement section, a values section, and team member cards.
globals_schema.execution_result_T003: Created a dark-themed, modern products.html page for a Nuclear Fusion Startup landing page using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN. Included 6 product/service cards in a grid layout with title, description, image, and price. Added product/service filters. Linked to all other pages in the header and footer.
globals_schema.execution_result_T004: Created dark-themed contact.html page with contact form, location, and support links, integrated with Tailwind CSS and Flowbite.
globals_schema.execution_result_T005: Created a reusable, dark-themed header component with navigation links using Flowbite and Tailwind CSS.
globals_schema.execution_result_T006: Created a dark-themed, reusable footer component with social media icons and navigation links to other pages. The footer uses Flowbite and Tailwind CSS for styling and can be easily copied and pasted into other HTML pages.
globals_schema.execution_result_T007: Integrated the shared header code into index.html, about.html, products.html, and contact.html

nodes.description: Generate index.html: Hero section with fullscreen background image, features section, testimonials, CTA, footer with social icons.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a dark-themed, modern hero section for index.html of a Nuclear Fusion Startup landing page using Flowbite + Tailwind CSS via CDN. Include a fullscreen background image from picsum.photos (use URL: https://picsum.photos/200/300 or placeholder.com if picstum fails). Implement a features section, a testimonials section, a call to action and a footer with social media icons.  Ensure proper meta tags and a title. Link to all other pages (about.html, products.html, contact.html) in the header navigation bar and the footer.

files.index.html:
FusionTech
  • Home
  • About
  • Products
  • Contact

Powering the Future with Nuclear Fusion

Clean, sustainable energy for generations to come.

Learn More

Our Key Features

Sustainable

Unlimited clean energy with zero carbon emissions.

Powerful

Harnessing the power of the stars for global energy needs.

Global Impact

Transforming the world's energy landscape.

What Our Clients Say

"FusionTech is revolutionizing the energy sector. Their commitment to sustainability is truly inspiring."

John Doe, CEO

"We are proud to partner with FusionTech in their mission to provide clean energy solutions worldwide."

Jane Smith, Investor

Ready to Join the Fusion Revolution?

Contact us today to learn more about our groundbreaking technology.

Get in Touch

© 2024 FusionTech. All rights reserved.

FusionTech
HomeAboutProductsContact

Our Products & Services

Compact Fusion Reactor

A small-scale fusion reactor for residential energy needs.

Price: $500,000

Industrial Fusion Plant

A high-output fusion plant for industrial energy demands.

Price: $2,000,000

Fusion Energy Consulting

Expert consulting services for integrating fusion energy into your business.

Price: $100/hour

Fusion Waste Disposal System

Safe and environmentally friendly fusion waste disposal.

Price: $750,000

Fusion Research Grant

Grants for university and private fusion research projects.

Price: Contact Us

Fusion Training Program

Comprehensive fusion energy training for professionals.

Price: $15,000

nodes.description: Create a CSS file to ensure consistent dark theme across all pages and responsive layout.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a separate CSS file (named `style.css`) that ensures a consistent dark theme across all HTML pages (index.html, about.html, products.html, contact.html) including setting the basic color scheme, font choices, and overall styling. Add responsive layout via Tailwind CSS. Link this CSS file in all of the HTML files generated (`final_index_html_code_T008`, `final_about_html_code_T008`, `final_products_html_code_T008`, `final_contact_html_code_T008`).

nodes.description: Create JavaScript file to handle any dynamic functionality such as form submissions, image loading etc.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a JavaScript file named `script.js` that handles any dynamic functionality required for this multi-page website. Specifically, implement JavaScript to handle form submissions from contact.html. For image loading, use lazy loading and set up background image preloading via JavaScript (for hero section). Link this JavaScript file in all of the HTML files generated (`final_index_html_code_T008`, `final_about_html_code_T008`, `final_products_html_code_T008`, `final_contact_html_code_T008`).

output.execution_result_T010: Created script.js with lazy loading, background image preloading, and form submission handling.

nodes.description: Distill all codes and produce a report
nodes.agent_prompt: Summarize all the code generated in `final_index_html_code_T008`, `final_about_html_code_T008`, `final_products_html_code_T008`, `final_contact_html_code_T008`, `dark_theme_css_T009` and `dynamic_js_T010` into a report.
